&#3925;&#4017;&#3906;: [1732] ... 1) lag pa'i zhe sa/ ... phyag sor/ ... phyag bde po/ ... phyag zhabs/ ... 2) ming 'ga' zhig gi sngon du sbyor ba'i zhe tshig gcig  ... phyag dam/ ... phyag rdzas/ ... 3) phyag 'tshal lugs kyi rnam grangs shig  ... 'byor phyag  ... thon phyag ... phyag 'os su gyur pa'i yul la phyag bya ba/ ...
1. bla ma dang mgon pa 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/; 2. zhal gcig phyag gnyis
